description.value:
A crodlu is a large, flightless drake with a beak and weak, clawed forelimbs that can be used to manipulate small objects. It is a tough and aggressive hunter in the wild. When trained, it makes an excellent war mount. Standard Actions Triggered Actions Published in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 123.

A crodlu is a large, flightless drake with a beak and weak, clawed forelimbs that can be used to manipulate small objects. It is a tough and aggressive hunter in the wild. When trained, it makes an excellent war mount.

Standard Actions

Triggered ActionsPublished in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 123.
